moves.1. d4 d5 2. c4 e6 3. Nc3 Nf6 4. Nf3 Be7: QGD: Harrwitz attack. White wants to retain the dark squared bishop instead of trading it through the Bg5 lines.
moves.15... Qd7 16. Bxb6 Bb7 17. Ne5 Qe8 18. N: And here begins the King-side attack
moves.18... Kxf7: !!!!! Yes folks I didn't want to play Rook or Queen takes as it leads to a skewer. My King can waltz over to h6 safely!!! :)
moves.19. Bxe6+ Kg6 20. Qd3+ Be4 21. Rxe4 Nxe4: To prevent the major piece on moving in. Please comment if you see better moves

gameName: How I escaped a King-side attack
